metadata.name: AI Mourns 1
metadata.description:
AI algorithms coproducing a film on loss, mourning, and memorialization.
While one AI paints scenes tuned to these experiences, another composes songs that root the piece in a haunting tone.


AI generated lyrics:

The flower of memorialization is a daguerreotype of the mourners.
The mourning is done with precision, but the flowers are not.
What on earth is this?  Where is this memorial?  Where is the memorial? 

The flowers are so small, the image is so small, the image is so small,  I have no power.

The cemetery is haunted by the dead, and the film will ruin the environment.
